title: Shadowrun RPG: 6th Edition 30 Nights
description: 30 Nights is a detailed campaign book to help players learn and have fun with Shadowrun, Sixth World. It introduces players to new rules and new track lines, immersing them in the growing chaos at UCAS as they look to the source of a mysterious blackout plaguing Toronto. The adventures can be played as a single game session to introduce players to the new rules, multiple sessions hitting highlights of the adventures, or a detailed campaign that propels players through each of the 30 nights of the blackout. and the ensuing chaos.
